::CyberShark::
   
    He embraced Battera back. "Yes, Battera, it's really=
 me."
    He looked at her and almost wept.
    "We're going to need to get=
 out of here."
    He had his plan all formulated in his mind, he knew abou=
t the chip that made him "Predacon" but since he was already similar to the=
 Predacons (Destron) the chip only made him really want to follow Zardus. H=
e also knew that he would never be able to over power Zardus, that the only=
 way he would be able to escape was to get on an away from base mission and=
 cloak.
    "I need to speak to Zardus," He said to Battera in a very buisn=
ess like tone. "Can you tell me where he is?"
  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday,=
 October 06, 2000 12:06 PM
  Subject: Re: It was worth a try


  ::Battera:=
:

  She heard the pounding on the door.  She thought for a it was Zardus 
=
  here to beat her for being so disrespectful to him. She stormed to 
  the=
 door and threw it open, "LOOK I HAVE JUST ABOUT HAD ENOUgh...."
  She stop=
ped and stared at Cybershark. She couldn't believe her own 
  eyes.  There =
was CyberShark, standing in her doorway looking back at 
  her.  Suddenly a=
 flood of emotions from her part with filled her.  
  Her legs felt weak an=
d she almost fell.  She hung onto the door and 
  looked at him. "CyberShar=
k? It's really you?" She still couldn't 
  believe her eyes.  She took a st=
ep forward and put her arms around 
  him and embraced him.  Her spark as s=
he felt his in her arms.  A few 
  tears rolled down her cheek,"Oh by the M=
atrix I have missed you."


  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Da=
chande85@m...> wrote:
  > ::CyberShark::
  > 
  >     Still having no room =
of his own he was wondering what the 
  blazes was going on. He looked arou=
nd the hallways and noticed things 
  that could be cameras, or sensors. Cl=
oaking was no a good idea.
  >     Just after that he heard a fist slam int=
o a bulkhead. He came 
  running. He turned a corner and saw Battera just a=
s she went into her 
  room.
  >     "She's here!" CyberShark said. Many of=
 the past emotion flooded 
  his systems and his eyes went back to blue. He=
 then realized that he 
  had to play the good little solider for the time =
being, his eyes went 
  to crimson again. He walked to the door and pounded=
 on it. "Battera, 
  it's me."
